content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the undercling.  From there, move up through a crimp and great sidepull for a solid topout.  A right heel hook in the hueco helps gain the left hand crimp and right hand sidepull.
content.protection: A few pads and spot, the landing is rocky where the problem climbs.
content.location: This is on the North face of Gunslinger Rock.

climbs.name: The Reinvigoration of Dave's Love for Donna

content.description: Sit start matched at the undercling. From there, traverse left along the shelf's bumps and edges, and eventually connect with the slab for an easy finish.
content.protection: Three or more pads ideally. The landing has several rocks behind it.
content.location: It traverses the boulder's north face.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the undercling-pinch.  From there, utilize a knee-bar and climb through the jugs to reach the solid topout.
content.protection: Pads and a spot, the landing is rocky where the problem climbs.
content.location: This is on the North face of Gunslinger Rock.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand undercling and a large, right hand pocket.  From there, traverse left through a pair of pockets and top it out over the boulder's nose.  Utilizing a toe hook helps with the traverse.
content.protection: A few pads, there are some rocks present where the problem climbs.
content.location: This is on the North face of Gunslinger Rock.

content.description: Short but sweet, Gunslinger sit starts below the west-face overhang and climbs straight out and over the lip.  The crux is the first move, as it requires a left hand dyno around the lip, big move but the setup is perfect, another option matches a heel heek in the start-hold hueco and moves up on a small crimp.
content.location: This is on the west-face of Gunslinger Rock.

content.description: Start matched on an undercling. Also a kneebar can be placed here. Move up then out right all on jugs for a nice warm-up.
content.location:
It is the rightmost climb as you approach the boulder and to the right of

Putz

.

content.description: Start with your hands matched on a jug, then move up right to the seam, and follow it up. There are good holds the whole way up.
content.protection: Pads. A bi-fold would be nice to cover a rock that is partially in the landing zone.
content.location:
It is on the back side of Gunslinger Boulder. Walk down left of

Gunslinger

.
